name: Tasty
description: API to query data about recipe, plan, ingredients, etc... as on official site

api_methods.name: tips/list
api_methods.description: This endpoint is used to load tips (reviews)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The value of recipe id returned in .../recipes/list .../feeds/list .../recipes/list-similarities endpoints

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the tips for the recipe with ID 3562?
I need the first 10 tips for the recipe with ID 1234.
What are the reviews for the recipe with ID 5678, starting from the 5th tip?
Please provide 20 tips for the recipe with ID 91011.
Get me the tips for the recipe with ID 1415, but skip the first 10.
I want to see 5 tips for the recipe with ID 1617, starting from the 3rd one.
Show me the tips for the recipe with ID 1819, starting from the 7th tip.
Can you list 15 tips for the recipe with ID 2021?
I need the tips for the recipe with ID 2223, but skip the first 20.
Please provide the first 25 tips for the recipe with ID 2425.
